name: ElderCareStories
0:
”Alexa, open elder care stories”
”Alexa, start elder care stories”
”Alexa, ask elder care stories for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: elder care stories
des: ELDER CARE STORIES Capture a Story. Experience the Care Giving Process... AUDIENCE Elder Facilities & Elders Families & Elders... PRODUCED by Elder Radio & Television Network... POWERED by Elder Happiness Association... THANK YOU Jana Panarites of The Agewyz Podcast & Author of Scattered: My Year As An Accidental Caregiver... THANK YOU Partners for Radio TV & OnLine Content... THANK YOU Audience for Joining In The Wonderful World of Elder Happiness... THANK YOU Everyone for Creating More Elder Happiness & Less Elder Loneliness... SIGNON Welcome to Elder Care Stories. Episode Summaries from The Age Wise Podcast... SIGNOFF Random Salutations... ELDER TALKS Will be Available for These Podcast Episodes... PODCAST The Agewyz Podcast is Available on Apple Podcasts... PODCASTER Jana Panarites is a perennial caregiver who engages with unsung heroes - people caring for family members, friends and relatives amid the demands of their own lives - plus professionals in the field of aging and people using media to creatively address major health issues, foster dialogue and challenge widespread assumptions about aging. Laugh, cry, share and know you're not alone... DISCLAIMER "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number“...
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
